actions.text: Amendment SA 3478 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 3478 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S7270-7273; text: CR S7272) To provide for appropriate coordination in the preparation of the report on contractor security in Iraq, and to add other congressional committee recipients for the report.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3478 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3478 proposed by Senator Warner.

purpose: To provide for appropriate coordination in the preparation of the report on contractor security in Iraq, and to add other congressional committee recipients for the report.
